landing.bio: I am a Full stack developer. Using Javascript frameworks and libraries for both  server side and scripting frontend. I use Meteor and Express (Nodejs) framework for the server side development and React/React-native for the frontend development. I have also worked with GraphQL. I am an active member of Facebook Developers Circle Lusaka and Forloop Zambia.
